reviewText: This video is ideal for people who want to learn how to ski or snowboard. First-time participants will see how to use their equipment, what they will learn in a new skier or rider lesson, and how to use the chair lift.New Skiers & Riders Gearing to Go Guide

that is useless it is not an instruction that is a small video showing what to take for the mountain and how to put the equipments, can you imagine that is ridiculous you find better videos in youtube. I don't recommend.
